info.task: navigate to beginning of modal dialog
info.title: Navigate to the beginning of a modal dialog

setupScript.name: openAddDeliveryAddressDialogAndFocusFirstInput
setupScript.description: opens the 'Add Delivery Address' modal dialog, and sets focus on the first input

user: With focus on an input inside a modal dialog, navigate to the beginning of the dialog.
instructions.raw: With focus on an input inside a modal dialog, navigate to the beginning of the dialog.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Level of the heading (2) is conveyed
Text of the heading ('Add Delivery Address') is conveyed
